channel.title: Best way to get unbanned
channel.description:
i got perm banned for macroing, but i got it undone... here is how it works
first send in a real appeal saying that you dont macro, then the next day when they say your still perm banned, send in a fake appeal laughing at them and saying HA HA HA I GOT THIS GUY BANNED!!!! HE WAS LEGIT< AND HES BANNED MUHAHAHAHA IM GOING TO DO THIS MUCH MORE OFTEN, and shit like that
they lock your acount becasue *someone* else knows your pass, recover your account, and vola your unbanned :D
hope this helps people

item.title: Best way to get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

l3etal3lade:

Doom wdf does that prove that says you entered the form on the wrong place…

okay dude look, you see what i did on the last thing???

that what got me unbanned

you want a screen shot???

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

okay here is proof…

From:   Jagex  
  Subject:   Re: Your RuneScape Account  
  Date:   12 May 2006 01:58  
  Delete  
 


Hi IAMABETTERPE,

We regret to inform you that this account has been identified as breaking our rules on macro usage.

Please refer to the Rules of conduct -

Rule 7: You must not attempt to use other programs (e.g. bots, macros or autominers) in conjunction with our games to give yourself an unfair advantage at the game. You also may not circumvent any of our mechanisms designed to log out inactive users automatically.

Please see the Macro FAQ in the FAQ section of the RuneScape website for more details on our macro policy.

As a result of this recent offence, and in light of your previous record, your account has been permanently banned.

If you feel you have been banned in error, you may appeal once. For the appeal to be successful you will need to explain why the ban should be lifted, and will need to convince us there wont be any further problems with this account.

To make an appeal please do so using the Ban Appeal section of the Customer Support area of the RuneScape website.

Sincerely,
RuneScape Customer Support

then

From:   Jagex  
  Subject:   Re: Your Recent Support Query  
  Date:   20 May 2006 17:21  
  Delete  
 


Dear IAMABETTERPE,

Thank you for your ban appeal.

We regret to inform you that this account has been banned because of Macroing.

Please refer to article number 7 in the Rules of Conduct:

Rule 7: You must not attempt to use other programs (e.g. bots, macros or autominers) in conjunction with our games to give yourself an unfair advantage at the game. You also may not circumvent any of our mechanisms designed to log out inactive users automatically.

We do not discuss our detection process with anyone, to do such would give auto/macro users information to help them avoid detection. For all the details on our macro detection that we are willing to give out please read the Macro FAQ, which can be found by selecting the link titled 'Get the answer to a question' under the 'Information and Advice' section (left) on the main page of our website (www.runescape.com).

We are 100% confident in our macro detection systems, and in the highly trained staff who monitor and take action based on the results presented by these systems, and as such are 100% confident that you have been using such a program. This is a clear violation of the Rules of Conduct as and such your account has been placed on a permanent ban.

This decision is *final* and any further ban appeals will not be considered.

Sincerely,
RuneScape Customer Support


***********************************
On 20th May 2006 you sent us the following:

okay heres what it is

i did not auto, i promise(or macro as you call it) you see after my first time and i got banned(i admit i did it then) i read the rules and realized that i was wrong. i love this game, it truly awsome. and i play it as much as possible. but recently i have been having password problems(my name has been stolen 3 times) so it could have been them.PLZ give me my life back

and finnally

From:   Jagex  
  Subject:   Re: Your Recent Support Query  
  Date:   21 May 2006 18:47  
  Delete  
 


Dear IAMABETTERPE,

This is not the correct form for password support.

You must use the correct form so we can verify your identity before issuing you with a new password.

Please can you fill out an Account Recovery form through the appropriate procedure (as detailed below) so we can be sure we are returning this account to its rightful owner.

1. Go to http://www.runescape.com/

2. Under the 'Account Recovery' section (left) on the main page of our website, click on the link titled 'Recover a locked account'.

3. On the resulting pages read the instructions and fill out all fields in the forms.

4. Click the 'Submit Request' button and you will be issued with a Tracking ID. Please remember to write this down as you will need this to establish if your request has been successful or not. 

Sincerely,
Mod Far
RuneScape Customer Support


***********************************
On 20th May 2006 you sent us the following:

ha ha ha

i got him banned. stupid jagex fuckers, this guy was innocent... I DID IT ALL, muhahaha

now hes banned for life, so funny WOOT. im gonna do this to all of your members

enjoy your haunting, since my test subject worked!!!

i almost feel sorry for him... almost

oh well, since you assholes decided to ban him, he lost his name all thanks to me

***********************************
 





The contents of this message are strictly confidential and are intended only for the owner of the account to which it was sent. The contents of this message must not be disclosed to any other person or copies taken.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Cheesehunk:

Or just say your sorry, and it will never happen again, and say you work hard on your account, and you are very sad without it.

not when they include this in the message “in light of your previous record” rofl i pretended i was on a huge network and that i dont have a previous record and i deserve another chance. REJECTED

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“Original Daniel, post:8, topic:3294”]omg as if this would work, jagex isnt that stupid.
they would check the ip logs to make sure it was someone else on your account that you were autoing from.

the only way you could is by telling a friend your pass and getting them to auto, then sending them an appeal saying someone got your pass.
even if it did work (which i really doubt), it wouldnt work for anyone else because jagex would have staff as members of this site and would know that its a trick.[/quote]

Nope, i got my main unbanned by saying that I ahve never autoed on that acoount, but I autoed on others, and it would never happen again, and I felt really bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

Incase you haven’t noticed lately, Jagex doesn’t read ban appeals for macroing. If you did get unbanned, it was luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

omg as if this would work, jagex isnt that stupid.
they would check the ip logs to make sure it was someone else on your account that you were autoing from.

the only way you could is by telling a friend your pass and getting them to auto, then sending them an appeal saying someone got your pass.
even if it did work (which i really doubt), it wouldnt work for anyone else because jagex would have staff as members of this site and would know that its a trick.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

beleive me ron, honesty is almost the best policy unless you have been banned before, then youre pretty much screwed. if u say u have never auto’d their is 1/100 chance of getting unbanned… say youre so sorry and will never do it again, almost 99/100 chance u will get unbanned, yet if u dont mention autoing i have no idea what wil happen … say u start saying u have a crap life or you are going to kill ureself…

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Cheesehunk:

Or just say your sorry, and it will never happen again, and say you work hard on your account, and you are very sad without it.

If you admit it, they won’t feel any sympathy and they will ban you. Honesty is not always the best policy.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Or just say your sorry, and it will never happen again, and say you work hard on your account, and you are very sad without it.

accutally no, i never did change my ip, and yet they still unbanned me
